title: Verify all user RTP policy is matched for access method "Enterprise Browser" and Skope-it alerts are generated
custom_steps:
Create a policy for All users to block/alert/allow with box app
Access box app from Enterprise browser
Check that SAML auth login is displayed
Check accessing box.com should be denied/allowed based on the action in policy
Check the transaction events for EB access method
custom_expected:
Auth should be performed
user based policy is hit
Skope-it alerts are generated for the policy applied
